MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL23 postcode area of Bala, affecting properties in Rhyd Uchaf, Maes Y Waen, Fron Goch, Llidiardau, and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 7:59 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a snapped electricity pole and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  9:29 am on 14th January, 2021.
